price: Warri isaaniin duraas sobsiisanii jiru. Isaan kun (humnaafi qabeenyaanis) tokko kurnaffaa waan isaaniif kenninee hin geenye. Ergamtoota kiyya sobsiisanii (Nuti isaan balleessine) adabbiin kiyyas akkam ta’e? (Mee xiinxali!)
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ وَمَا بَلَغُواْ مِعۡشَارَ مَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَكَذَّبُواْ رُسُلِيۖ فَكَيۡفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba alladhīna min qablihim wamā balaghū miʿ'shāra mā ātaynāhum fakadhabū rusulī fakayfa kāna nakīri
